name: Project F.A.T
description:
Welcome to Project F.A.T

Play as Lucia, a girl infused with a virus that causes the body to grow stronger at an accelerated rate. 

As the virus grows and gets stronger, your appetite and voracity increase with it. Can you eat enough before the virus sucks away your life? Or will you manage to find the cure. 

Currently still in development and updated monthly (If all goes according to plan)
